Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the incident did not occur on the final day of shooting and that the movie's stars, Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet, were not on set at the time.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that "dozens" of people were sickened, while the expert's verdict mentions that nearly 80 people were taken to the hospital.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the claim.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the seafood chowder was intentionally spiked with PCP, without providing any evidence or proof of this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not explore or mention any alternative explanations for the illness of the cast and crew members on the set of "Titanic."
